manifest_description.message: Find single biblio citations using the context menu.

invalid.message: That selection did not appear to be a citation.

request_timeout.message: The BiblioSpotter service is currently unavailable.

modal_header.message: Help teach BiblioSpotter by adding, removing, or adjusting tags.

modal_failure.message: Sorry, something went wrong and BiblioSpotter did not receive your tagged citation.
